colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B (CES SHIS PA BRJOD CING ME TOG GI CHAR BABS PAR BYA'O, ,DGOS 'DOD MA LUS 'BYUNG BA'I GLANG PO @012A *, ,RIN PO CHE LA MCHOD PA 'BUL TSUL DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI NI, ^MGON PO KLU SGRUB KYI GSUNG DRI MA MED PA GLANG PO RIN PO CHE LAS NOR BLANG BA'I MAN NGAG GI TSIG RIS RE POR BZHAG GI STENG NAS SNGA PHYI SDEBS TSUL GYIS MTSAMS SBYAR TZAM GTZUG TE, RANG DANG BSKAL MNYAM LA PHAN SRID SNYAM PA'I BSO BA'I KUN NAS BSLANG STE RIG 'DZIN SNANG MDZAD RDO RJES BSGRIGS PA'I YE SHES  PA NI PIKshU SU MA TI BADZRA GYIS SO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL DANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG` BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU DAM PA RNAMS KYIS CHOS SGRUB PA'I MTHUN RKYEN TSANG BA DANG, LOG 'TSO LNGA LA ZHEN PA RNAMS KYIS SEMS 'GYOD CING CHOS KYI 'TSO BA LA 'BYOR BA DANG, DBUL PHONGS RNAMS KYI SDUG BSNGAL BSAL NAS SPYOD RGYA CHEN PO DANG LDAN PA LA SOGS PA MDOR NA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,MA DPE DA NA ZHU DAG BYA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
